title: Fix BSOD during install if disk space is low
body: If you have no more disk space; the install crashed. After that, you have a BSOD in loop ... You have to refresh your computer.

comments.body: Do you really think that after 3 months I still have logs on my computer? And you probably miss the "refresh" part on the issue. Of course I have no more logs and of course I will not try to install that again.
F* portal I wrote my message, signed in and my message was deleted thanks to a nice page refresh .............
